videos.title: THIS IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PLANE TICKET IN THE WORLD | Etihad A380 The Residencemy airplane seat has three rooms this back here that's my bedroom [Music]
videos.transcript: Time: 00:00 - 00:10 okay this is it I'm about to board the plane and fly in the residence which is a three room airplane seat with like a Time: 00:20 - 00:30 living room a bathroom and a bedroom and it's on an a380 this huge plane this is Time: 00:30 - 00:40 my seat I think we're taking off now so Time: 00:40 - 00:50 firstly we have your complimentary and we had Wi-Fi voucher we have your headset noise-canceling pajamas and also Time: 00:50 - 01:00 an additional lounge where actual signature of the pilot Tim okay I'll now Time: 01:00 - 01:10 begin with a little tour first is this room here this room is considered like the living room if you walk back here through my hallway Time: 01:10 - 01:20 you get to this room this is the bedroom an entire bedroom and then if you head back to the living room on the way there Time: 01:20 - 01:30 is this room alright back to the living room it's got two full-size seats and when I say full size I don't mean like like a regular airplane seat I mean I mean like Time: 01:30 - 01:40 what is effectively two fully reclining it really feels a lot more like a couch maybe now just a prosperous gigantic Time: 01:40 - 01:50 seat is this little bench here in addition to it serving as a great footrest here and then under this person Time: 01:50 - 02:00 refrigerator light room typically light room is measured in inches but in this seat and the seat you measure in feet Time: 02:00 - 02:10 so that there is about three feet of Time: 02:20 - 02:30 legroom but but if I move over about a foot and a half to the right my legroom increases by quite the margin and that's Time: 02:30 - 02:40 14 feet of legroom Time: 02:50 - 03:00 [Music] now when you're back here you have like Time: 03:00 - 03:10 a proper bedroom so the bed is like a real bed like a proper proper bed that's just a mirror now what feels really Time: 03:10 - 03:20 extraordinary about this besides the fact that I'm laying in a bed on an airplane it's just the sheer amount of privacy you have it's when you're in the seat you definitely have privacy because Time: 03:20 - 03:30 there's this wall here but look somebody can just kind of peek over there's no Time: 03:30 - 03:40 windows no one can get back here there's a big bed there's a TV for you Time: 03:40 - 03:50 [Music] Time: 03:50 - 04:00 that was the turndown service [Music] Time: 04:00 - 04:10 now an airplane bathroom is usually the grossest place on the whole plane it's basically a flying port-a-potty but with this seat you get a private Time: 04:10 - 04:20 bathroom you don't have to share this bathroom with anyone this is just my bathroom if you wanted to use the toilet with the door open you definitely could Time: 04:20 - 04:30 in addition to all these fancy amenities [Music] Time: 04:30 - 04:40 you have your own proper shower right here Time: 04:40 - 04:50 [Music] Time: 04:50 - 05:00 this is how much time you have and it gets the red you're out of water didn't Time: 05:00 - 05:10 bring any extra underwear I tried to wash these in the shower probably a Time: 05:20 - 05:30 terrible idea [Music] Time: 05:30 - 05:40 it's my first course Time: 06:10 - 06:20 they do main course it's funny a passion fruit sorbet Thank Time: 06:20 - 06:30 You palate cleanser second main course so we're just about there which means Time: 06:30 - 06:40 out to get off this plane soon which is unfortunate see there are two things that you never really get when flying on an airplane and that space and privacy and this plant had a borderline ridiculous amount Time: 06:40 - 06:50 of both of those things look this is an empty seat right here so in conclusion I didn't pay for this flight they gave it Time: 06:50 - 07:00 to me for free so I make a youtube video about it but but if you're looking to spend about the price of a new Toyota on one flight one experience Time: 07:00 - 07:10 wonderful Time: 07:20 - 07:30 [Music] Time: 07:30 - 07:40I cannot afford to watch this video

videos.title: WHY I ALWAYS WEAR SUNGLASSES it was no major equipment as you to be my guy
videos.transcript: Time: 00:00 - 00:10 quick run this morning because this Time: 00:20 - 00:30 morning is morning is daddy-daughter swim class going swimming Time: 00:30 - 00:40 I had a meeting in Midtown this morning took the subway I don't feel like a change of pace today's episode in its Time: 01:00 - 01:10 entirety is going to be about my sunglasses now I've made an entire movie about the design of my sunglasses and Time: 01:10 - 01:20 then like a year ago I made an entire vlog episode about how to make these sunglasses you want a sharp knife and Time: 01:20 - 01:30 you just kind of straight today I want to really get into like the why why wear sunglasses plus I need to buy a new pair and these are kind of whoa these are not Time: 01:30 - 01:40 sunglasses so it'd look crazy don't lie it's superhero oh look this is like a heads-up display set up for this little Time: 01:40 - 01:50 drone that was a gift it's one of those like you shoot like 60 mile an hour racing drones let me stand subject Time: 01:50 - 02:00 today's video is going to be just about my sunglasses a long time ago somebody asked Jack Time: 02:00 - 02:10 Nicholson why he always wears sunglasses and he responded when I'm not wearing sunglasses and just another old guy and Time: 02:10 - 02:20 when I am wearing sunglasses I'm Jack Nicholson he wanted to get me on my back the following scene is not sponsored by Time: 02:20 - 02:30 nor made an affiliation with this sunglass store Time: 02:30 - 02:40 does your sunglasses they are my sunglasses not as good as yours but do Time: 02:40 - 02:50 you ever wear sunglasses at night always really only way to rid of them I'm Casey hi Casey okay let's see what these are virgin Time: 02:50 - 03:00 glasses they feel so good these are mine that's why thank you nice to meet you Time: 03:00 - 03:10 now I just want to be SuperDuper clear this is not an endorsement of this brand these glasses are the only vices that fit on my gigantic head so that's why I Time: 03:10 - 03:20 wear them if you're thinking of making your own glasses I suggest finding a pair that works for you and start there Time: 03:20 - 03:30 Chloe asked hey Chloe on a scale of 1 to 10 how much does Candace dislike me Time: 03:30 - 03:40 wearing my glasses it's not that she doesn't like me wearing the glasses that she doesn't like me wearing the glasses like when I'm not outside or when it's not sunny out Time: 03:40 - 03:50 has anyone ever has anyone ever stolen a pair from you no does Candace ever accuse you of using them to check out other beautiful no no Time: 03:50 - 04:00 how often do you get new ones well I did just get a new pair but typically like less than once a year I rarely lose them that's one of the good parts of always wearing them is that you always know Time: 04:00 - 04:10 where they are do you wear them all the time off camera not really how much they cost I think they're like 150 dollars minus the spray paint are you Time: 04:10 - 04:20 uncomfortable showing your eyes know what spray paint Brandie is krylon the Time: 04:20 - 04:30 spray painted champions why do you make your nice glasses look like they came from the dollar store well I think nice is in the eye of the beholder that was a play on words Time: 04:30 - 04:40 I think these glasses are nicer because I made them than sunglasses that were made in Italy in a factory just because they're new doesn't mean they're nice I Time: 04:40 - 04:50 don't think those are nice I think those are generic these are mine how do you keep them clean I don't throw is filthy do you sleep with them on no but they're Time: 04:50 - 05:00 usually on my bedside table when I wake up here's a good question Oscar asks why do you buy real expensive ray-bans and remove the logo instead of buying cheap fake ones because these are actually Time: 05:00 - 05:10 higher quality glasses what makes a Mercedes or a Lamborghini nice is not just the thing that says Mercedes our Lamborghini it's actually a better car if you were to write Lamborghini on a Time: 05:10 - 05:20 Hyundai it wouldn't be a Lamborghini it would be a Hyundai that says Lamborghini so these are actually really good quality glasses that's glass not plastic and they're tough and I wear them Time: 05:20 - 05:30 everyday and they don't break usually so I like to wear good glasses I just don't like the name brand so I take it off Time: 05:30 - 05:40 Casey when are you going to make another pair how about right now making these things it's not that hard I don't know how many pair of made over the years the truth is Time: 05:40 - 05:50 I don't lose them and they don't really break but they do expire it's like all the balance that's in the plastic that makes up the frame it just starts to stretch out in time right now I'm Time: 05:50 - 06:00 scraping the logo off of the lens see I have a tendency to lose things and I'm Time: 06:00 - 06:10 making these so I've got a fresh pair and then this old pair here will become my backup hair just taking down the logo there don't paint in it Time: 06:10 - 06:20 the last step here is just hitting them with the paint you break every rule of spray painting because what you want is you want it to sink into the crack see you just flood them with paint that is Time: 06:20 - 06:30 the sloppiest worst spray paint job Time: 06:30 - 06:40 you'll ever see me do now I'll just leave them there to sit overnight when I wake up in the morning I'll scrape the paint off and they'll look kind of like these probably with just a touch more paint now the biggest question that I Time: 06:40 - 06:50 get asked is why why do I always wear sunglasses the first part of the answer is I just like believe glasses look there's a really pragmatic reason okay Time: 06:50 - 07:00 you know how when I'm talking to camera like I'm talking to camera right now I can always point at things like hey look at this screen right here or check out these lights behind me or check out this blue lunchbox right here or this movie Time: 07:00 - 07:10 poster movie I produced right there The Godfather it's right here I'm not looking into the lens I'm looking into this screen right here and that way I can frame things up I know what I'm Time: 07:10 - 07:20 looking at but what I do with my glasses off I don't look like I'm looking at you I look over here so like imagine if in all my vlogs I'm looking like this it Time: 07:20 - 07:30 starts to feel really weird and I can look back here and then look over there try to pretend to look over there but in the end it's just like if I want to point at this I can either look over Time: 07:30 - 07:40 here or I look here and just sort of guess but when I have glasses on it always looks like I'm looking at camera so that's why I started wearing glasses Time: 07:40 - 07:50 and all my vlogs it's like a really practical reason that's why at night it's just like it's the only way I can check my framing without Time: 07:50 - 08:00 having it look weird I hope see when people vlog and they're not looking into the lens it's like it doesn't what about my glass they're awesome that's you're Time: 08:00 - 08:10 lying no I'm not noise yelling you're gonna put them on there because your eyes are so cute and pretty and then you cover them with these glasses I Time: 08:10 - 08:20 know what you're talking about just such pretty broad I think I just like my glasses okay Time: 08:20 - 08:30 that's it Time: 08:40 - 08:50 will you help me cut my hair tonight No why not Time: 08:50 - 09:00The answer is at 6:50 Your welcome.

videos.title: DO WHAT YOU CAN'T to the haters the doubters my seventh
videos.transcript: Time: 00:00 - 00:10 grade vice principal to everyone who's ever told anyone with a dream they can't this video is for Time: 00:10 - 00:20 you keep your head down follow the rules do as you're told play it safe wait your turn ask permission learn to compromise Time: 00:20 - 00:30 this is terrible advice if I were to write an autobiography a book about my life one title that would work would be do what Time: 00:30 - 00:40 you can't because that idea encapsulates everything I've ever done like when I wanted to move to New York City and my dad was like you can't you don't have any money or when I first said I wanted Time: 00:40 - 00:50 to make movies and it was you can't you didn't go to film school I want to have a TV show you can't Casey you're not pretty enough Time: 00:50 - 01:00 and to go even further like if I were to characterize what this new generation of content creators and filmmakers what what we all do on YouTube and everywhere Time: 01:00 - 01:10 else is we do what we [Music] can't you can't be an action movie Time: 01:10 - 01:20 filmmaker but you get your parkour friends to dress up like video game characters jump off some buildings and you can right Devon yes you can't have a Time: 01:20 - 01:30 talk show but you have a webcam and you can up You Beautiful Bastard what this is my first YouTube video ever next thing you know you're interviewing the president I heard that you're going to Time: 01:30 - 01:40 be out of a job soon maybe I'll start a YouTube show that's what I'm thinking you can't fly around New York City on a magic carpet but get your electric skateboard some PVC pipe a great outfit Time: 01:40 - 01:50 give Jesse a call and you can what do you think this going be so dope you don't need gear you don't need trucks or a crane you don't need some big expensive camera that never worked when Time: 01:50 - 02:00 you're a Creator you don't need someone in your ear telling you what you can and can't do I'm racing the subway what you can and can't say I accidentally did the Time: 02:00 - 02:10 Shocker oh my God they call us Gamers influencers internet famous what the [ __ ] does that mean but we know something they don't you can start a vlog or a makeup Channel we travel Time: 02:10 - 02:20 around the world with a gigantic piano playing in beautiful places for interested people when you're a Creator all you need is your phone an internet connection and a g idea a story you want Time: 02:20 - 02:30 to share something you need to say confidence is within yourself and the rest is [Music] Time: 02:30 - 02:40 history if you do it right you get to quit the day job make friends from places you've never been meetups Time: 02:40 - 02:50 collaborations just two boys and two video cameras a life moving so fast and so full you won't even have time to process it [Music] Time: 02:50 - 03:00 so to my fellow creators I say keep creating keep doing the [Music] Time: 03:00 - 03:10 work and never forget you don't have to listen to anyone because in this new world no one knows anything hi the haters the doubters are all drinking champagne in the top deck of the Titanic Time: 03:10 - 03:20 and we are the [ __ ] iceberg [Music] Time: 03:20 - 03:30 do what you can't [Music] Time: 03:30 - 03:40that really is my 7th grade principal.  when i was 12 he told me i'd be a loser, that i'd 'either be working at a gas station or in jail when i grow up'.  never discourage a child.  fuck that guy.

comments.text:
what I can't.  I grew up with everyone telling me what I could and could not do.
How to do what I should do.  And when to do what I should do.  How to dress,
when to dress and the result is I am a well above average IQ, brave adult who
did not do what I was created to do but did what I was told to do.  I deeply
appreciate your message Casey.  Good on you.  You are half my age and one of
my heros.  The creators and wishers will do well to take your advice.
